headline.print_headline: Ex-Blackwater Guard Says Didn't Feel Threatened
headline.main: Ex-Blackwater Guard Says Didn't Feel Threatened

lead_paragraph: The defense team in the Blackwater trial attacked the testimony of a key prosecution witness Thursday, telling a jury that the witness lied to federal investigators even after he had sworn to tell the truth in an effort to win leniency in the case surrounding the killings of 14 Iraqis.
